oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mayor Beverly Briley with the Hudson and Wilson Families, 1971
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Mayor Beverly Bridley with the Hudson and Wilson families after their relocation to Parkway Terrace (Project Tenn. 5-22) during the East Nashville Urban Renewal Project, September 1971. Photographed by R.W. Ray of the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
